about.title: About
about.description: I work on backend projects built on modular architectures and technologies such as Node.js, NestJS, GRPC, RabbitMQ, PostgreSQL, and MongoDB. My background in digital communication taught me how to bridge technology and user needs, translate requirements into concrete solutions, and collaborate effectively within multidisciplinary teams. Today, my work follows a philosophy of responsible engineering, where code quality, documentation, and knowledge sharing are essential. My core values: rigor, kindness, transparency, and curiosity. Above all, I strive for continuous improvement and technical precision in every project I build.

presentation.title: About me
presentation.description: As an experienced backend developer, I design and maintain robust, scalable technical architectures. With a degree in Digital Communication (EJCAM – Journalisme and Communication School of Aix-Marseille), I first worked at the crossroads of communication strategy and web development, where I developed a passion for structure, logic, and code precision. This dual background — between creativity and engineering — shapes the way I approach development today: understanding users, thinking in terms of product, and delivering reliable code. I work on both Node.js/NestJS microservices and custom WordPress sites, always with the same focus on performance, clarity, and maintainability.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Have a question? An idea? Feel free to reach out, I'd love to exchange with you.
